participant_1.background:
I'd be a terrible soldier if I were blind.
I love that my job allows me to help animals in need.
I've managed to manage my diabetes well enough to become a bartender.
i drive a ford taurus.
I am a vegetarian who is concerned about my father's health.

participant_2.background:
I still love to listen to music that reminds me of my childhood, especially songs from the 80s.
I'm proud of my ability to adapt to change.
I live in pittsburgh and love it, although I do miss my children when I'm away on work trips.
I'm not interested in sharing details about my personal life.
My family is very close and we always have each other's backs.

content.text: What's your favorite song from the 80s?
I love so many, but "True Colors" by Cyndi Lauper is definitely a favorite. It reminds me of my childhood and my best friends.
I love that song too! It's so catchy and upbeat. What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse, and I love it! I get to help people every day, and it's very rewarding.
That's awesome! I'm a bartender, and I love it too! It's great to be able to make people happy and have a good time.
I'm sure you're great at your job! What's your favorite drink to make?
My favorite drink to make is a margarita, but I also love making mojitos and daiquiris.
Mojitos are my favorite! I love the taste of mint.
Me too! And they're so refreshing, especially on a hot day.
I agree! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I'd love to be friends and talk more about music and our jobs.
That sounds great! I'd love to be friends too
